author: Chainmailandangst
text:
It's 4:30am here in Illinois.  The sun has rose in Kyiv well before.
Are the Sunflowers rising as well?
I think Terry Pratchett, and Sam Vimes would like to see them and the little angels RISE UP RISE UP RISE UP WITH HEADS HELD HIGH!

author: Chainmailandangst
text:
And if you try 
                  Oh please, please
Try!
                 I'm already sagging
In the corner and have nothing 
Left to lose.

author: Chainmailandangst
text:
No, this year will see 
               My fists up.  
You will not get me
              Defenceless.

I'm guarding my chin
      My heart

author: Chainmailandangst
text:
This year will get no
        Friendly welcome
                             From me.
I have no olive branch,
            Nor roses.

            This year
             Is my enemy from 
The start.  My trust in
        Benevolence wanes
By the weight of experience
